name: incremental-cycle-detect
description: Keeps a directed acyclic graph topologically sorted each time you add an edge or vertex to check for cycles.

scripts.test: npm run transpile && npm run test-prod
scripts.test-prod: npx nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text npx mocha --reporter spec dist/test
scripts.doc-create: npx typedoc --mode file --name js-incremental-cycle-detect --readme README.md --out docs --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --excludeNotExported --excludeProtected --ignoreCompilerErrors --theme minimal main.ts
scripts.clean: rm -rf main.js main.d.ts docs coverage dist
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run lint
scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run doc

author: Andre Wachsmuth
